abstract: Rescue teams extract three more survivors from the rubble of the earthquake in eastern Turkey as the death toll reaches 481 and snow begins to fall, which will probably complicate further rescue attempt and add to the misery of homeless survivors.
snippet: A student, a teacher and a woman trapped under a five-story building were rescued on Wednesday, but the death toll from Sunday’s earthquake continued to rise.
lead_paragraph: A student, a teacher and a woman trapped under a five-story building were rescued on Wednesday, but the death toll from Sunday’s earthquake continued to rise.

headline.main: 3 More Quake Survivors Pulled From Rubble in Turkey
headline.seo: In Turkey, 3 More Earthquake Survivors Are Pulled From Rubble
